Instructions:

Enter a letter into the box and press the button to submit it.
You have 5 lives to guess the profanity and if you do, you can view the definition via the Define button.

Theres only two problems, i hope, and they are:
	 1/ you can submit a number and it will count as a guess.
	 2/ only use lower-case letters. it wont recognise capitals.

 By the time i'd realised, it was too late. Sorry.

Enjoy
